Writer: Johnston McCulley (character Zorro), Ted Elliott (story), Terry Rossio (story), Randall Jahnson (story), John Eskow (screenplay), Ted Elliott (screenplay), Terry Rossio (screenplay)
Title: The Mask of Zorro
Actors: José María de Tavira, Diego Sieres, Emiliano Guerra, Yolanda Orisaga
Plot: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 16 nominations.
